segments.text: Can you lend me some money ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry . I've already gone through my paycheck for the week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You â€™ Ve gone through all your money so quickly ? I thought you were well-off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not me . You know money always burns a hole in my pocket .
segments.speaker: S2
